comment:
Extracted Variables:
- \( x_1 \): Quantity of hardwood flooring produced weekly
- \( x_2 \): Quantity of vinyl planks produced weekly

Extracted Constraints:
1. \( x_1 \geq 20000 \): At least 20,000 square feet of hardwood flooring must be produced weekly.
2. \( x_2 \geq 10000 \): At least 10,000 square feet of vinyl planks must be produced weekly.
3. \( x_1 + x_2 \geq 60000 \): A total of at least 60,000 square feet of flooring must be shipped weekly.
4. \( x_1 \leq 50000 \): No more than 50,000 square feet of hardwood flooring can be produced weekly.
5. \( x_2 \leq 30000 \): No more than 30,000 square feet of vinyl planks can be produced weekly.

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize profit: \( 2.5x_1 + 3x_2 \)
